metadata.dc:author: Mainetti, José Alberto
metadata.dc:description: Since the outset, bioethics has been organised as ethics in commission, then it developed as a two-faced academic discipline with one face open to society and the other turned towards culture. It thus forms a bridge between techno-science and social morals. Commission is literally "management in common "from which comes the manner of being ethical in the field of life sciences and health. Our aim is to draw up an overview of bioethics in commission in its theoretical, historical and prospective aspects.
metadata.dc:title: Bioética, ética en comisión.
[Bioethics, ethics in commission].
metadata.dc:publisher: Journal international de bioethique = International journal of bioethics
